description: Exponential transform of Pascal's triangle A007318.
comments: Triangle T(n,k), 0<=k<=n, read by rows, given by [1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, ...] DELTA [1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, ...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938 . - Philippe DelÃ©ham (kolotoko(aT)lagoon.nc), Aug 10 2005
links: Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
formula: a(n, k)=Bell(n)*C(n, k). E.g.f.: A(x, y)=exp(exp(x+xy)-1).
crossrefs: Cf. A000110, A007318. Row sums give A055882.
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jun 09 2000
